        This function is used to add a new Course to the database. The logic flow happens in this function
        Parameters:
        courseID - - refers to the Course Code
        Name - - refers to the Course Name
        faculty - - refers to the Faculty Name the course is offered by
        au - - refers to the Number of AUs
        indexList - - refers to the Index's of the Course
        lectures - - refers to the Lecture
        hasTutorial - - indicates whether the Course has a tutorial or not
        hasLab - - indicates whether the Course has a lab or not
        Returns:
